Action.author: caod
Action.body: Note: this will also loosen the requirements around getting code merged since we won't be pushing to Fabric afterwards.

Action.author: caod
Action.body: Consider go mod implications and versioning. Do not call it version 1 (otherwise can't change) since we aren't done yet.

Action.author: caod
Action.body: For now this story will just encompass moving the pkg/configtx code out to a fabric-config repo. Followup nuances will be addressed in a future epic for cleaning up fabric integration tests to use the new library and ripping out configtxgen related code in favor of consuming the new package.
